title: Initial Entry
description: Enter the four-digit code on the keypad.

title: Troubleshooting: Screen Lock
description: If the screen locks up (numbers remain displayed and keypad becomes unresponsive), repeatedly press any key on the keypad until the screen goes blank and the red light blinks. This indicates the system has reset.

title: Re-entry After Lockup
description: Once the screen is blank and the red light blinks, re-enter the four-digit code on the keypad.

title: Successful Entry Confirmation
description: Verify that the system unlocks and grants access.
